titleStmt.title: Miscellanies upon moral subjects by Jeremy Collier ...
titleStmt.author: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Sam. Keeble ... and Jo. Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Published in parts. The first pt. was published as: Miscellanies, in five essays. 1694.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
